attributes.action: Stand down and let Kenny rogers take over
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that the Pm should stand down and make way for Kenny Rogers so that this country can once again be lead by a man with clear ideas and decency.If the country were to be run by kenny then it would not continue on the downward spiral it is on at the moment.As he has said many times before..You've got to know when to hold them,know when to fold them,know when to walk away,know when to run......well walk away Mr Blair !

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
